Name: Duplicated ARIA ID
Description: Ensures IDs used in ARIA and labels are unique

Name: Image Alternative Text
Description: Ensures elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation

Name: HTML has Lang Attribute
Description: Ensures every HTML document has a lang attribute

Name: Document Title
Description: Ensures each HTML document contains a non-empty <title> element

Name: Meta Refresh
Description: Ensures <meta http-equiv="refresh"> is not used for delayed refresh

Name: HTML Lang Valid
Description: Ensures the lang attribute of the <html> element has a valid value

Name: Avoid Inline Spacing
Description: Ensure that text spacing set through style attributes can be adjusted with custom stylesheets

Name: ARIA Allowed Role
Description: Ensures role attribute has an appropriate value for the element

Name: Skip Link
Description: Ensure all skip links have a focusable target

Name: Hidden Content
Description: Informs users about hidden content.

Name: Nested Interactive
Description: Ensures interactive controls are not nested as they are not always announced by screen readers or can cause focus problems for assistive technologies

Name: No Autoplay Audio
Description: Ensures <video> or <audio> elements do not autoplay audio for more than 3 seconds without a control mechanism to stop or mute the audio

Name: Object Alternative Text
Description: Ensures <object> elements have alternate text

Name: ARIA Required Parent
Description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require parent roles are contained by them

Name: ARIA Toggle Field Name
Description: Ensures every ARIA toggle field has an accessible name

Name: ARIA Tooltip Name
Description: Ensures every ARIA tooltip node has an accessible name

Name: ARIA Valid Attribute Value
Description: Ensures all ARIA attributes have valid values

Name: ARIA Valid Attribute
Description: Ensures attributes that begin with aria- are valid ARIA attributes

Name: ARIA DPUB Role Fallback
Description: Ensures DPUB roles used fall back to their base role

Name: Radio Group
Description: Ensures related form elements have a group and that the group designation is consistent

Name: Layout Table
Description: Ensures layout tables do not use data table elements

Name: Checkbox Group
Description: Ensures related checkboxes are grouped together

Name: Video Description
Description: Ensures <video> elements have captions and/or an audio description track

Name: Complementary Landmark Is Top Level
Description: Ensures the complementary landmark or aside is at top level

Name: Contentinfo Landmark Is Top Level
Description: Ensures the contentinfo landmark is at top level

Name: Main Landmark Is Top Level
Description: Ensures the main landmark is at top level

Name: No Duplicate Main Landmark
Description: Ensures the document has at most one main landmark

Name: Presentation Role Conflict
Description: Elements marked as presentational should not have global ARIA or tabindex to ensure all screen readers ignore them

Name: Region
Description: Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks

Name: Scope Attribute Valid
Description: Ensures the scope attribute is used correctly on tables

Name: Color Contrast Enhanced
Description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AAA enhanced contrast ratio thresholds

Name: Duplicated ID
Description: Ensures every id attribute value is unique

Name: Identical Links Same Purpose
Description: Ensure that links with the same accessible name serve a similar purpose

Name: Unique Frame Title
Description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain a unique title attribute

Name: Duplicated Active ID
Description: Ensure every id attribute value used in active elements is unique

Name: HTML XML Lang Mismatch
Description: Ensure HTML lang and XML:lang attributes have the same base language

Name: CSS Orientation Lock
Description: Ensures content is not locked to any specific display orientation, and the content is operable in all display orientations

Name: Frame Title
Description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain a non-empty title attribute

Name: Accesskeys Unique
Description: Ensures every accesskey attribute value is unique

Name: Page Bypass
Description: Ensures each page has at least one mechanism for a user to bypass navigation and jump straight to the content

Name: ARIA Dialog Name
Description: Ensures every ARIA dialog and alertdialog node has an accessible name

Name: ARIA Text
Description: Ensures "role=text" is used on elements with no focusable descendants

Name: ARIA Treeitem Name
Description: Ensures every ARIA treeitem node has an accessible name

Name: Empty Heading
Description: Ensures headings have discernible text

Name: Empty Table Header
Description: Ensures table headers have discernible text

Name: Iframe Tested
Description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain the axe-core script

Name: Heading Order
Description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

Name: Image Redundant Alt
Description: Ensure image alternative is not repeated as text

Name: Label Title Only
Description: Ensures that every form element has a visible label and is not solely labeled using hidden labels, or the title or aria-describedby attributes

Name: Banner Landmark Is Top Level
Description: Ensures the banner landmark is at top level

Name: No Duplicate Banner Landmark
Description: Ensures the document has at most one banner landmark

Name: No Duplicate Contentinfo Landmark
Description: Ensures the document has at most one contentinfo landmark

Name: One Main Landmark
Description: Ensures the document has a main landmark

Name: Unique Landmark
Description: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

Name: Large Meta Viewport
Description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> can scale a significant amount

Name: Page Has Heading One
Description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading

Name: Tabindex
Description: Ensures tabindex attribute values are not greater than 0

Name: Table Duplicate Name
Description: Ensure the <caption> element does not contain the same text as the summary attribute

Name: Focus Order Semantics
Description: Ensures elements in the focus order have a role appropriate for interactive content

Name: Valid Lang
Description: Ensures lang attributes have valid values

Name: Target Size
Description: Ensure touch target have sufficient size and space

Name: No Exceptions Meta Refresh
Description: Ensures <meta http-equiv="refresh"> is not used for delayed refresh

Name: Label Content Name Mismatch
Description: Ensures that elements labelled through their content must have their visible text as part of their accessible name

Name: Paragraph As Heading
Description:
Ensure bold, italic text and font-size is not used to style

elements as a heading

Name: ARIA Role Description
Description: Ensure aria-roledescription is only used on elements with an implicit or explicit role

Name: Role Img Alt
Description: Ensures [role='img'] elements have alternate text

Name: Color Contrast
Description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

Name: Definition List
Description: Ensures <dl> elements are structured correctly

Name: DL Item
Description: Ensures <dt> and <dd> elements are contained by a <dl>

Name: Link In Text Block
Description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color

Name: List
Description: Ensures that lists are structured correctly

Name: List Item
Description: Ensures <li> elements are used semantically

Name: Marquee
Description: Ensures <marquee> elements are not used

Name: Scrollable Region Focusable
Description: Ensure elements that have scrollable content are accessible by keyboard

Name: ARIA Required Attr
Description: Ensures elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes

Name: ARIA Required Children
Description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them

Name: Meta Viewport
Description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming

Name: ARIA Roles
Description: Ensures all elements with a role attribute use a valid value

Name: Autocomplete Valid
Description: Ensure the autocomplete attribute is correct and suitable for the form field

Name: ARIA Allowed Attr
Description: Ensures ARIA attributes are allowed for an element's role

Name: ARIA Command Name
Description: Ensures every ARIA button, link and menuitem has an accessible name

Name: ARIA Hidden Body
Description: Ensures aria-hidden='true' is not present on the document body.

Name: ARIA Hidden Focus
Description: Ensures aria-hidden elements are not focusable nor contain focusable elements

Name: ARIA Input Field Name
Description: Ensures every ARIA input field has an accessible name

Name: ARIA Meter Name
Description: Ensures every ARIA meter node has an accessible name

Name: ARIA Progressbar Name
Description: Ensures every ARIA progressbar node has an accessible name

Name: Blink
Description: Ensures <blink> elements are not used

Name: Button Name
Description: Ensures buttons have discernible text

Name: Input Button Name
Description: Ensures input buttons have discernible text

Name: Label
Description: Ensures every form element has a label

Name: Link Name
Description: Ensures links have discernible text

Name: Select Name
Description: Ensures select element has an accessible name

Name: SVG Img Alt
Description: Ensures <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text

Name: Input Image Alt
Description: Ensures <input type="image"> elements have alternate text

Name: Server-Side Image Map
Description: Ensures that server-side image maps are not used

Name: Area Alt
Description: Ensures <area> elements of image maps have alternate text

Name: TD Headers Attr
Description: Ensure that each cell in a table that uses the headers attribute refers only to other cells in that table

Name: TH Has Data Cells
Description: Ensure that <th> elements and elements with role=columnheader/rowheader have data cells they describe

Name: Video Caption
Description: Ensures <video> elements have captions

Name: Table Fake Caption
Description: Ensure that tables with a caption use the <caption> element.

Name: TD Has Header
Description: Ensure that each non-empty data cell in a <table> larger than 3 by 3 has one or more table headers

Name: Audio Caption
Description: Ensures <audio> elements have captions
